title: acer P Series 105 cm (42 inch) Full HD LED Smart Android TV  (AR42AP2841FD)

product_specification.In The Box: LED TV - 1N, Remote Control - 1N, Batteries AAA Type - 2N, User Manual - 1N, Screws - 4N, Stand - 1 for each side
product_specification.Other Video Features: Full High Definition Panel, Intelligent Frame Stabilization Engine, Wide Color Gamut, 16.7 Million Colors, HDR10, Digital Noise Reduction, Micro Dimming
product_specification.Supported App - Others: MX Player, Sony Liv, Voot, Voot Kids, Zee5, Spotify, Prime Music, Hungama, Google Play Movies, Smart Player, Google Games
product_specification.Content Providers: Netflix, YouTube, Google Play Movies and TV, Google Play Store, Prime Video, Disney+Hotstar
product_specification.Other Internet Features: More than 5000 Apps and Games, Chromecast, Google Play Store, Google Assistant, 10,00,000+ hrs of Content
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear and Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: We'll facilitate a standard installation and demo through an authorized service engineer at your convenience. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on the tabletop or Wall mount which will be complementary valid for 30 days from the date of purchase,All additional accessories and wall mount bracket not part of the package will be charged separately. The service engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features. The process generally covers standard wall-mounted or tabletop installation, as requested. Physical check of all ports, including power, USB ports, and Accessories. Demonstration of features and settings, plus a quick run-through on how to operate the TV.

product_description.Immersive Picture Quality: This Acer TV features a Wide Colour Gamut and HDR10 to deliver 16.7 million colours, stunning highlights, and visible textures to offer you a true-to-life entertainment experience.
product_description.Smooth, Clear, and Sharp: The Intelligent Frame Stabilization Engine of this TV analyses as well as augments the transition of frames to offer smooth, clear, and sharp visuals. Thus, you can enjoy fast-paced sporting actions and high-intensity action sequences with stunning clarity and without lag on this TV.

No 5G wifi connectivity available(this is not mentioned anywhere clearly in description), RAM in led is 1.5 GB but don’t feel like 1.5 GB RAM type led(legging sometimes). Speed is same as my other led have 1 GB RAM. But display is up to mark and i feel the HDR10 quality, at the end i need better display so i am happy with led. Sound is also good you have to turn on the surrounding sound in setting. One star cut for its RAM management and Wifi connectivity.
They must be update the software for smooth functioning.

TV is overall good, better and best. Highly recommend, only drawback is no wall mount and installation don't expect they will not come. If you have screwdrivers and drill machine its simple to install DIY. No complaints about the TV , go for "Acer". I'm happy with the TV.

Worst TV . All reviews are false. Picture settings won't work. Contrast brightness colour settings won't match each other. Picture quality changes in every app and we have to change settings every time. Finally worst quality picture will be seen. Software developed by this company is faulty. Display panel used is thrown away panels from QC checks in chaina. If you buy this TV your money is invested on wrong item , your eyes get strained and your eyesight will be lost in few days due to mismatched , blurry pictures. Flipkart throws on seller, and Seller don't respond for our calls and repair requests , if once can the technician cannot solve

Have been using this Acer P series Tv over last 4 months and it’s quite smooth without any glitches and issues, I must say a good TV at this price range.

Fine for price. But I noticed 50hz refresh rate is bit noticeable when watching FHD content and sports. Its jittery I felt compared to my previous 60hz TV.

Also should have provided easy option to select default app when opened after switching on. It opens with apps selection page insted of opening where I left it before last power off. Looks like its still not fixed by any android TV brand.

No brightness control when app is opened. Like hotstar/Amazon prime.

Becomes very hot. I can feel heat wave from the backvents of TV . This was warm in previous tv but in this one its hot. I have added a PC fan on the tv for pulling out hot air from the motherboard.

Switch off overscan from settings to get better experience.
